name: Art Academy: Second Semester
description:
Return to Art Academy for a second semester of lessons and tools that will bring out the artist in everyone.
Art Academy is a portable art course that anyone can join to replace the lecture-like structure of art school, or the trial and error on canvas, with a Nintendo DSi system. In Art Academy: Second Semester, new and returning students are presented with another set of in-depth lessons designed to encourage the creation of more complex artwork. By gaining an even deeper understanding of colors and techniques used by famous impressionist artists, you will be taking on more challenging themes that include moving objects and vast landscapes with distant objects. Combined with the openness of Free Paint mode, you’ll find plenty of opportunities to hone your skills and boost your confidence as an artist.
